about_the_game:
Henri and the Hexagons is a top-down narrative adventure game where you play as Henri, a grumpy old man, and his loyal canine companion, both represented by simple dots.

Inspired by the minimalist aesthetic of Martin Panchaud, the 2023 Angoulême Comics Festival Grand Prize winner, Henri and the Hexagons invites players to project their own imagination onto each scene.

Behind this minimalist appearance hides a fantastical and humorous world filled with bizarre characters and outlandish situations. For Henri, a grumpy sixty-year-old based in Switzerland, could unwittingly become the savior of the Earth and traverse multiple solar systems. Embark on increasingly extravagant quests like in RPGs, pilot top-secret vehicles in shoot-'em-up style... Henri and the Hexagons is also a tribute to the great classics of video games.

Key Features

  • Unique Aesthetic

    Immerse yourself in a unique world where all characters are represented by simple geometric shapes.

  • Surprising Gameplays

    Follow Henri's adventures and enjoy a variety of gameplay elements, each seamlessly integrated into the narrative. From classic RPGs to shoot 'em ups, players will always be surprised!

  • A Touching Story

    The adventures of this anti-hero oscillate between the grotesque and more serious moments, exploring themes such as old age and family relationships.

Join Henri and his dog on their extraordinary cosmic odyssey!

short_description: Experience the extraordinary adventures of Henri, a grumpy old man represented as a dot. Encounter hexagonal aliens, pilot top-secret vehicles in a shoot'em-up style, or flee from giant pigeons to help Henri save the Earth.
